Text:
I will comment that you make it unnecessarily difficult to find out what the torrent is about. No IMDB reference, no link, no series name (I gather this is part of the Ancient Apocalypse series). 

Maybe I'll be curious enough to research it for myself, but another time, I won't bother, I'll just catch it on MVGroup.

Well friend,
I typed "BBC4 Mystery of the Minoans" into google, and I got stacks of information on the program, instantly.

Thanks for the comment, it's more than most bother to leave, but if you can't be bothered to "google" it, don't bother with the download. Simple.
More info would be helpful, but I appreciate the upload
